content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 19 Jan 2019What should I do if I have not receive any reply on my CDP application since 2 weeks ago?I sent my CDP application letter along with supporting documents about 2 weeks ago via snail mail and I have not received any reply, what should I do?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yanti Fauzi, Airside Officer at Changi Airport GroupLevel 2. RookieUpdated on 19 Jan 2019I used to be like you when I was applying for my CDP account 2 month ago. I waited for quite sometime for it to be approved, even end up calling the customer service for a few times and email them for the approval. Thinking that the mail might be missing haha.Patience, you will receive your letter of approval in about 1 month time after application via snail mail.  After that, you still need to wait for the DCS (Direct crediting service) after receiving your CDP approval. So happy waiting. 0 comments2
